author: sharad
msg: HADOOP-5981. Fix a bug in HADOOP-2838 in parsing mapred.child.env. Contributed by Amar Kamat.

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3082 TUSCANY-3090 - Remove references to the old EndpointReference and replace with EndpointReference2 and Endpoint2 as appropriate. You'll see that some of the changes have left more commented out code as the old EndpointReference has code to support callback/conversation function not required by OASIS. I've also disabled some itests for this reason. Note that callbacks over web services won't work yet as work on EndpointReference2 is still ongoing.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1691: Filter EIP now marks exchanges as filtered that split, multicast, enrich now uses to skip filtered exchanges when doing aggregation.

author: antelder
msg: Add the bpel webapp itest to the build as its working now
